title: Even After Jan. 6 Riot Was Quelled, Oath Keepers Were Urged to Fight On
description: Testimony at the seditious conspiracy trial of members of the far-right group demonstrated that they were not deterred by their failure to stop certification of the 2020 election.
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: Trump supporters moving toward the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021.
